main.java

Class Battleship

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Battleship

  • public class Battleship
extends java.lang.Object
    The Model of the application, where each object is a battleship board, represented by a 2D array.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Opponent board represented as 2D array of constants

      Client/Server objects, depending on the player.
      int player
      integer representation of the player if player is 1, player is the host if player is 2, player is the peer
      Server s 
      static int SHIP 
      BattleshipState state
      State object to control what state the Model is in.

        public static final int SHIP
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • p

        public Peer p
        Client/Server objects, depending on the player. If the player is the host, they are the server. If the player is the connector, they are the peer.

      • s

        public Server s

      • myBoard

        public int[][] myBoard
        Player board represented as 2D array of constants

      • enemyBoard

        public int[][] enemyBoard
        Opponent board represented as 2D array of constants

      • state

        public BattleshipState state
        State object to control what state the Model is in. This state value helps to control the look and functionality of the view, and well as the turn based logic of the controller

      • player

        public int player
        integer representation of the player if player is 1, player is the host if player is 2, player is the peer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battleship

        Constructor for the player2 (the player connecting to a host)

        peer - peer object which communicated with the server

      • Battleship

        public Battleship(Server serv)
        Constructor for the player1 (the host)
        Parameters:
        serv - server object which communicated with the peer

        Place a random ship of length 1 on myBoard
        Parameters:
        r - RNG to add randomness in ship placement

      • randomize

        public void randomize()
        Function to randomize the ship placements using the myBoard object Ships of length 4, 3, 2, and 1 will be randomly spread through the 10x10 board

      • fireAt

        public boolean fireAt(int i,
                      int j)
        Function to facilitate an enemy firing at the player's board
        Parameters:
        i - row index of the 2D array
        j - column index of the 2D array
        Returns:
        boolean value based on if a ship was hit

      • fireResult

        public void fireResult(int i,
                       int j,
                       int result)
        Function to update the current player's view of the enemy board, based on the result of their guess. The result value will be stored in the position (i, j)
        Parameters:
        i - row index of the 2D array
        j - column index of the 2D array
        result - integer constant of the result of the fire function

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver()
        Check if the game s over by passing through the player's board and checking how many unmarked ship are left
        Returns:
        boolean value. true if the game is over, and false if not

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String msg)
        Wrapper function for the send method within the Peer/Server object
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send over the network

      • recv

        public java.lang.String recv()
        Wrapper for the receive method in the Peer/Server object
        Returns:
        the message received as a string

      • printMyBoard

        public void printMyBoard()
        Print method to print the player's board Key: S - Ship X - Hit Ship W - Water M - Miss E - Error (invalid data)

      • getState

        public BattleshipState getState()
        Getter for current state
        Returns:
        the current state of the battleship object

      • setState

        public void setState(BattleshipState s)
        Setter for the current state
        Parameters:
        s - State to set the Battleship model to
